UNM NON-COMMERCIAL - EDUCATIONAL
SOUTH FLORIDAâ€™S COMMUNITY STATION
Administrative Offices - 275 N. W. 2nd Street - Miami 36, Florida
DADE COUNTY BOARD OF PUBLIC INSTRUCTION - LICENSEE
COMMUNITY TELEVISION FOUNDATION OF SOUTH FLORIDA, INC. SPONSOR
December 10, 1957
Nr. Frank Schooley
Director
University Broadcasting
University of Illinois
228 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
I AM ENCLOSING A COPY OF A VERY SWEET AND
TO-THE-POINT LOVE-NOTE WHICH I RECEIVED FROM
John Schwarzwalder upon my return home.
I THOUGHT you would be interested in seeing
THIS FINAL BLAST FROM JoHN.
